Richardson.Jesuit College Preparatory School of Dal:
Jesuit College Preparatory School of Dallas (commonly referred to as Jesuit Dallas, Dallas Jesuit, JCP) is a private, college-preparatory school for young men under the direction of the Society of Jesus and home to the Jesuit Dallas Museum in Dallas, Texas. While Jesuit operates independently of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Dallas, it exists and serves the Catholic community with the leave of the bishop.


== History ==


=== Timeline ===
Jesuit High School opened on September 14, 1942.
